title: Beet Maror
summary: Beet Maror is a gluten free, dairy free, and whole 30 side dish. One portion of this dish contains approximately 1g of protein, 0g of fat, and a total of 42 calories. This recipe serves 1 and costs 58 cents per serving. 7 people were impressed by this recipe. A mixture of apple cider vinegar, beet, horseradish root, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so flavorful. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 30 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 62%. This score is good. Try Beet Maror, Beet and Ricotta Gnocchi with Wilted Beet Greens and Aged Balsamic, and Roasted Beet Frittata with Beet Greens, Shallots, and Goat Cheese for similar recipes.
